Title: Tunlr.Sync
HomeWiki:
Tunlr.Sync

Tunlr.net sync client.

 

Tunlr.Sync is a small application that seats in your Systemtray and allows you to set one of your network adapter’s DNS IP addresses to Tunlr’s DNS resolvers. The application checks with Tunlr.net the current DNS addresses and validate with those configured in your Network adapter keeping them Up To Date.

You will never be using outdated DNS addresses anymore!

At the moment the application is still in Beta phase so expect some small bugs. In any case if you found one of those bug's or have some suggestions, just let me know leaving a comment.

 

Tunlr.Sync requires .NET framework 4.5 or higher.
